title: 服务器崩溃，一早上崩10次！ 150悬赏求支招
author: 耗子菌
txt_content:
不知道是插件还是什么原因！会崩掉！发现其中有at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.TileEntity.getOwner(TileEntity.java:180)这条报错。已删除owner组和admin组！已清查服务器所有OP以及拥有*权限的人。

以下是完整报错！
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Ooh. Shiny.

Time: 9/20/15 8:13 AM
Description: Ticking block entity

java.lang.NullPointerException: Ticking block entity
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.TileEntity.getOwner(TileEntity.java:180)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.TileEntityHopper.k(TileEntityHopper.java:219)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.TileEntityHopper.i(TileEntityHopper.java:181)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.TileEntityHopper.h(TileEntityHopper.java:173)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.World.tickEntities(World.java:1386)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.WorldServer.tickEntities(WorldServer.java:514)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.MinecraftServer.u(MinecraftServer.java:673)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.DedicatedServer.u(DedicatedServer.java:273)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.MinecraftServer.t(MinecraftServer.java:562)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:469)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.ThreadServerApplication.run(SourceFile:617)

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content: 太少了，看不出来有什么，还有你删除这个用户组是非常不明智的，你发一下启动时的logs或者crashreport

replies.author: 耗子菌
replies.txt_content:
snowclay 发表于 2015-9-20 09:09
太少了，看不出来有什么，还有你删除这个用户组是非常不明智的，你发一下启动时的logs或者crashreport ...
